PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13292022-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC,  NCC
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectOrder Approving that National Capital Commission Extend the lease with Hair Republic Byward Inc. and Hair Republic Inc.
PrecisOrder approving that National Capital Commission grant two options to extend the lease with HAIR REPUBLIC BYWARD INC. and HAIR REPUBLIC INC. for a period of five years each, beginning on April 1, 2024 and April 1, 2029 for the real property located at 7 Clarence Street, in Ottawa, Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Approving that National Capital Commission Extend the lease with Hair Republic Byward Inc. and Hair Republic Inc.
precis: Order approving that National Capital Commission grant two options to extend the lease with HAIR REPUBLIC BYWARD INC. and HAIR REPUBLIC INC. for a period of five years each, beginning on April 1, 2024 and April 1, 2029 for the real property located at 7 Clarence Street, in Ottawa, Ontario.
